subject: VAM motor malfunction
description_text:
Good morning
I am writing about a problem I had with a VAM haptic motor. I purchased the complete set of motors with the relative power supply to connect to the Plus X pedal board, which was already equipped with a control box.
At first, everything worked correctly, but after only 20 minutes, one motor stopped working. I tried swapping the various motors, but only that one doesn't work. No error is displayed on the screen.
I am attaching a video.

Thank you very much
Zamparutti Amedeo

conversations.body_text: Hi Amedeo Zamparutti, Please take a screenshot of the motor settings page so I can check your configuration. Additionally, the video you uploaded is incomplete. Please send us the link via Google Drive and ensure the sharing permissions are set correctly.

Good morning
Here is the requested video link. I hope it's fine

https://drive.google.com/file/d/11uJdHy_LJuZKD1uOeuL7lWWgMzO8Swc/view?usp=drivesdk

I also attach the requested photos

Sat 20 Dec 2025, 14:23 service @simsonn.com

Hi Amedeo Zamparutti, Please provide your order number, contact person, phone number, and shipping address. We will send you 1 replacement VAM motors. Please also note that the VAM motors should not be used in VAM Pro mode.

Hi

My order ID is 3065510739888092. I bought Italian on aliexpress.
